video.title: Deadly Sins
video.synopsis: A multimillionaire fakes his death and forces his relatives to live together in his mansion for one year to see who's worthy of inheriting his fortune.

episodes.synopsis: Don Evaristo informs his employees of his imminent departure, and the decision to gather his family to play a game to decide who will be his heirs.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The family attends Don Evaristo's supposed wake. Philipe announces the reading of the will. Gilberto suggests Teresa open the coffin.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Philipe reads the will, explaining the conditions to qualify for the inheritance. The relatives argue over their right to inherit from Uncle Evaristo.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The Salinas family prepare for the trip; Evaristo for the arrival of the heirs. Caridad warns Philipe, and Esperanza opens his eyes regarding Caridad.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The relatives are grateful that El Mago and his family are absent. Meanwhile, Don Evaristo suffers a mishap. Philipe extends a formal welcome.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The Salinas family complains about the imposed overcrowding. To Amadeo's chagrin, Caridad and Philipe make a stern clarification regarding the food.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The family is ravenous. El Mago causes confrontation between Fabiana and Teresa. A family member's enthusiasm causes the chicken coop to catch fire.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Amadeo is rebuked. Philipe is on Fabiana's and Esperanza's lips. Alberto's greed turns the whole family against him, but he takes it out on Libia.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza confides in Fabiana about her past love life. Although Don Evaristo's health is suffering, his plan's progress more than makes up for it.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Driven mad by hunger, Amadeo suggests he leave to look for food in the village. Evaristo comes up with an idea to make the game even more interesting.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Terrified, the family blames Amadeo for the power outage. Philipe comes up with an incentive to ease the tension. Milena is put on trial.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Milena's fate is sealed. Philipe announces a system of reward and punishment. A call delivering bad news takes Esperanza out of the game...for now.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo regrets not having settled debts on time. Alliances of the sexes are forged. El Mago reveals a discovery compromising Fabiana and Philipe.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana resents Philipe's attitude. While the women consider a mischievous idea, the men plan to conjure a strategy to get the better of them.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: The women rehearse while the men prepare their magic act. Philipe introduces a new guest. The game is suspended, and the men blame each other.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Gilberto thinks he's found the thief. Meanwhile, Simón meets Evaristo and Felicia. Caridad intervenes when anger gets the better of Philipe.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana comes clean with the women. Esperanza reveals Simón's father's identity to Felicia. A delegation is appointed to go to the village.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana and El Mago go to the village. She gets the mayor's support, and he meets the priest. Philipe intercepts the contraband and metes out justice.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza rescues Libia from the hands of her abusive husband. Doris meets Evaristo; recognizing him, she causes a scandal alerting Amadeo and Libia.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Visiting the village, Simón's resemblance to Philipe doesn't go unnoticed. Outraged, Philipe confronts Esperanza. The family sets out to do the tests.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The women face serious difficulties completing the test; the men do not. Alberto reluctantly agrees to take part in El Mago Kandú's disappearing act.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Libia doesn't sleep while agonizing over Alberto, who reappears in the morning and submits to an incredulous Philipe's interrogation.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: At home, the women relax, enjoy themselves and, emboldened by the wine, share their stories. Meanwhile the men go out to have a little fun.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal is arrested for DUI - Alberto makes the situation worse. Esperanza and Philipe argue over Fabiana. The boys get an unexpected reception.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Doris goes off the deep end, and the ladies lash out at their husbands. Don Evaristo proposes a new system to choose the heir to the fortune.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The women celebrate their triumph over the men. Alberto puts his plan to control the house into action. Aníbal rejects Hortensia's proposal.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Milena and Manuel try to prevent the orchard from freezing. Alberto pulls an ace from his sleeve, offering provisions to the family, but not for free.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Alberto's proposal divides the family. While Kandú considers working for him, Fabiana talks to Philipe, asking him to take action against Alberto.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Caridad and Philipe put Alberto in the hands of a family vote, but it's fate that has the last word. The women blame Esperanza for the outcome.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza faints by chance, which ends up igniting Philipe's jealousy. While under Felicia's care, Simon tricks her and disappears without a trace.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Simon is still lost. Hortensia makes a decision forcing Aníbal to ask El Mago for support. Gilberto intervenes, but a misunderstanding makes it worse.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza tells Philipe the truth. Caridad can't bear to see him in love with another and cuts to the chase. Philipe makes a proposal to Esperanza.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Philipe tells Don Evaristo his true motives. Simón witnesses Alberto's cunning. Amadeo devises a plan to cause a rift between El Mago and Alberto.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal and Amadeo try to open El Mago's eyes. Simón learns that Philipe is his father. The family disapproves of Esperanza's affair and steps in.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: It is up to Caridad to put Esperanza's future to a vote. Philipe asks for a level playing field. Simon makes a shocking discovery and tells Evaristo.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Philipe must organize the wedding - only Caridad can help. Alberto realizes he's being followed. Evaristo is worried about one of the wedding guests.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Alberto plays along with El Mago. Caridad announces the arrival of Ricardo, Hortensia's only love. Aníbal demands an explanation.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Hortensia's feelings for Ricardo come to light. While the others believe her missing, Doris blackmails Evaristo. Fabiana's kindness is misinterpreted.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Doris reacts fiercely to Fabiana. Ricardo will attend his daughter's wedding. Hortensia is hopeful. Esperanza and Philipe honor Fabiana and Gilberto.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: The men and women plan separate bachelor and bachelorette parties. Amadeo declares his love to Fabiana. El Mago and Teresa worry about Milena.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Milena throws cold water at Manuel. Ricardo arrives to a mansion full of surprises, some more shocking than others. Milena is taken to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Hortensia finally talks to Ricardo. Milena asks Caridad for absolute discretion, while Aníbal lays the cards on the table. The bachelor parties begin.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Hortensia undresses in front of Ricardo. It's time to celebrate. Amadeo rejects Fabiana's refusal. The gardener's presence isn't entirely welcome.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Milena takes advantage of the wedding to drop a bombshell. Caridad speaks to Don Evaristo. Philipe and Esperanza change their honeymoon destination.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana returns to tie up loose ends, inadvertently triggering a confrontation between Doris and Amadeo. Philipe's ex-girlfriend causes trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: With Aníbal's help, a depressed Hortensia reflects. Milena defies her parents again. Philipe and Esperanza agree that they should not have married.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana comes up with an idea to rid herself of Amadeo. Hortensia underestimates Caridad and complains to Ricardo, who decides to nip it in the bud.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: To Hortensia's delight, Manuel and Milena are denied the room but Gilberto comes to the rescue. The arrival of an illustrious visitor unnerves Aníbal.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Amadeo tips off Philipe about Fabiana's sexuality. The family catches El Mago and Teresa half-naked. Caridad explains the rules of a couples' test.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Doris and Gilberto win the test, sharing their find with the family. The warden confesses to bribing Alberto, who must face the maximum punishment.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: The organization decides a change: the inheritance goes to whomever deserves it. Fabiana and Doris present their project. Alberto seeks legal advice.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Caridad explains the new rules that will decide the greater share in the inheritance. Alberto's lawyer arrives at the estate with definitive demands.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: The family meets Aníbal's intellectual idol, who astonishes them. The professor provides therapy to the women and sparks distrust among the men.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Caridad informs the lawyer of the organization's decision and conditions. Aníbal confesses under duress. Evaristo asks Philipe for advice.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: The family is astonished to discover Evaristo's secret; he decides to redesign the game. The future of the losers will be in the hands of the winners.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Alberto and Aníbal are still in the game. Philipe challenges Evaristo, and Alberto offers to make a pact. Plans are drawn up to defeat the opponents.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: The teams begin to strategize. When Doris meets Don Evaristo alone and makes demands in exchange for his silence, Amadeo arrives and thinks the worst.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: While Fabiana's team is preparing physically, El Mago's team is casting spells. It starts out as an even race, until it comes to the tie-breaker.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo tells the family the steps to be taken. In the face of uncertainty, discord arises among the groups. The Cacumens spend the night away.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Gilberto and Hortensia are chosen to pass messages between the teams. Don Evaristo instructs the family on the next test: to assemble a vehicle.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: The teams work on the test, but none of the vehicles measure up. Insecurity leads them to consider how to get a teammate to infiltrate enemy ranks.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Alberto confesses his affair to Libia, who seeks more than comfort from Manuel. Sparks fly between Fabiana and Philipe. The day of the test arrives.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: The teams tie, but the one to hold out the longest wins. The winners receive a surprise prize in the courtyard. Simon intercedes for the losing team.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: The party continues, almost everyone seems more "cheerful" than they should be. News of Manuel and Libia's supposed kiss reaches Milena.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: El Mago apologizes to Manuel and Libia, and the group puts him to the test. The Cacumens are about to choose who is under threat from the other group.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Voting begins, a candidate is chosen. Esperanza regrets her actions. Evaristo informs the family that he will have to compete in a high altitude test.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Milena sees her son's life compromised. Esperanza uses Simón to spy on Philipe. Don Evaristo allows Manuel to enter the house, with consequences.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: The Cacumens welcome their new member. Alberto tries to talk to Libia. The teams simultaneously choose Teresa and El Mago to be messengers.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: After what happened to her husband, Teresa makes a compassionate plea to Don Evaristo. The groups begin to forge initial strategies to win the test.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: In Bogotá, Evaristo meets the only woman he has ever loved. El Mago intervenes for Alberto. At home, Simón finds Philipe in a compromising situation.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo and Silvana's love is rekindled. He proposes they make up for lost time. Caridad communicates the uncle's response to Teresa's request.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Despite his doubts, Evaristo agrees to Silvana's request. The couples don't take advantage of conjugal visits. Esperanza and Philipe make a decision.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: The family meets Silvana, who makes a great impression, especially on Amadeo. Doris resorts to extreme measures to prove she's not a useless old lady.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: The teams get ready for the test. The Cacumens entrust their flying device to pilot Amadeo, while Teresa is designated to fly for the rival team.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: The winners celebrate. Fabiana drinks until she musters the courage to talk to Philipe. Evaristo gives the instructions for the next test.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Alberto requests a meeting with the whole family without involving the organization. Evaristo speaks with Silvana of his intentions to end the game.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo modifies the will and tells Caridad what to do with the camp group. Aníbal, Gilberto and Amadeo bet on Esperanza's longevity in the house.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Milena and Teresa go to the doctor, and Teresa takes the opportunity to talk to the lawyer. Amadeo demands that Don Cándido be fired.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Philipe saves El Mago's life. Caridad puts the decision about Amadeo's request regarding Don Cándido in the family's hands. The trial is held.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo calls Philipe to give him some news. Alberto notices his absence and wakes the family. The uncle gathers the family to make an announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is surprised by the uncle's decision. El Mago proposes a plan to leave the house without being seen, which provokes mockery from the family.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo receives the summons and meets with the lawyer. Philipe mediates for the family. Faced with losing it all, Amadeo points out the culprit.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Don Evaristo summons the family to leave the house. El Mago's and Alberto's families unite to confront the uncle. Libia and Esperanza leave together.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: The family is still on strike. Caridad informs Don Evaristo, who does not hesitate to resort to brute force. The relatives face the outcome united.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza talks to Ricardo. They all miss each other and long for the life they had on the ranch. Philipe proposes a partnership to Fabiana.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal and Hortensia plan to give lessons on love. Philipe and Fabiana strengthen their relationship. Don Gomez makes a pass at Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: El Mago plans a great conjuring act in Bogotá and organizes a lunch. Evaristo wants to do his part and warns Silvana that the game isn't over yet.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Everyone arrives at the lunch. Amadeo gossips with Esperanza. The family catches up and reminisces. Alberto challenges Ricardo about his intentions.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Alberto and Ricardo continue fighting. The uncle supports Kandú. Ricardo informs Evaristo of his decision on the game. Alberto tries something crazy.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Philipe comes clean with Fabiana and tries to stop her from leaving the country. Caridad informs everyone of Don Evaristo's decision.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected participant arrives. Hortensia sows discord. The rules of the game are explained and the groups are formed.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo suspends the treatment and sends for the priest... to officiate a marriage. The family continues to study for the test and gathers together.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: The test begins, and Paulo Laserna is the moderator. The level of difficulty sparks a protest. The winners make their choice.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: The vote yields a result that incites revenge. The eliminated person receives a gift from Don Evaristo. Caridad announces a marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Evaristo chooses a house. El Mago advises Amadeo about Don Candido. Philipe and Manuel intervene in a fight and the wedding finally takes place.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Alberto sets his sights on Fabiana. Caridad announces the entry of new participants to the game, and Alberto and Hortensia declare war on them.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Silvana and Evaristo go on their honeymoon. Once again, Alberto tries to put an end to his unhappiness. Hortensia makes Libia feel guilty.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: The family welcomes Alberto. As soon as the newlyweds return home, Amadeo tests Don Cándido's patience. Libia plans her own elimination.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Amadeo's attitude arouses suspicion, and Fabiana organizes a family council. Caridad announces the next test. The groups conspire.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Gilberto talks about his childhood. The scenery for the test leaves everyone speechless. Esperanza and Fabiana come to blows.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Caridad convinces Hernán Orjuela to change the rules. Kandú does not know who to vote for. Esperanza is frightened when Simón goes for a walk.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: The whole family searches the farm for the child. Amadeo tries the unthinkable. The vote decides who's leaving. Don Evaristo suffers a relapse.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: The family prays for Cándido, who, upon awakening, pretends to be dead. At the funeral, Caridad reveals Cándido's unusual last will.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: The family tells horror stories and Evaristo frightens Alberto with Philipe's help. The grave is uncovered. Philipe confides the secret to Fabiana.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: The family, including Silvana, attends the séance. Accompanied by El Mago, Alberto visits Don Cándido's grave. Evaristo is up to his old tricks.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Manuel and Milena's shock at seeing Don Cándido induces an early labor. The storm stops them from going to hospital; Aníbel and Silvana take charge.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: The second session of the game begins, and Simón takes the lead. Evaristo is irritated to find that he is no longer in control.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: The women conspire to frame Eloísa as a thief. Alberto joins Simón in the game... but not for long. Philipe finds out and seeks to take advantage.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Philipe forms a cooperative with Fabiana, Esperanza and Alberto. Hortensia proposes a business deal to Don Cándido, and Eloísa leaves the house.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Don Cándido has a new nurse, but most of the family objects. The third session of the game begins. Philipe's cooperative grows. Two finalists remain.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Habemus ganadorum! Simón offers help to Don Cándido, who is moved and gives the boy ideas on how to make the best decision.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Simón decides to grant his wish to whoever makes him laugh. Despite the family's opposition, Caridad reads the wish list. The nurse returns.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Simón is furious when he sees Philipe and Eloísa talking in the garden. Kandú tries to convince Fabiana to tarnish Philipe's good name.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: As a result of Eloísa's rant, Amadeo chooses to dedicate his life to God. Martín is baptized. Esperanza's attempt to harm Eloísa backfires.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Felicia and Silvana rescue Esperanza. Doris demands that her necklace be found. Don Evaristo decides to expel one of the culprits.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Two are chosen to leave the house. Amadeo takes advantage of the opportunity to sow discord between Esperanza and Philipe.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Eloísa makes her choice. Don Evaristo learns of Libia's maneuver, deciding to make the just pay for the sinners: they must suffer a harsh punishment.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Simón puts the women to the test, while the men lose the battle. Aníbal tries to hypnotize Martín. The women plot an escape.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Martín proves that Alberto is good for something. Adán Guzmán visits his sister and mother, who reveals the name of his father.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Amadeo's preferences seem to have changed radically. Adán's mother dies. Caridad announces a visitor who claims to be Don Evaristo's son.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Under the pretext of bringing food to the women, Silvana probes Doris about Evaristo's paternity. Eva helps Adán escape. Evaristo asks for a DNA test.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza breaks the rules, and Don Cándido surprises her. Adán takes the DNA test. If Adán turns out to be his son, Evaristo already has a proposal.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: The DNA test yields results. Aníbal tortures Amadeo to get him to confess he's gay. Esperanza gets the tongue twister. The game has a new participant.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Caridad presents Evaristo's son to the family. Most of them welcome Adán and Eva, with the exception of Alberto, who questions the familial ties.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Gilberto is surprised to see Eva, whom he met under compromising circumstances. While Adán talks to Cándido about Evaristo, Fabiana asks about Adán.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Alberto tries to make the new members uncomfortable. Gilberto unburdens himself to Philipe. The men plan to get rid of Adán.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Silvana and Felicia see Adán and Eva's true colors when they invite them for drinks. Aníbal and Alberto throw a party to check Adán's birthmark.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal is given good reasons to suspend Amadeo's therapy. Adán proves to the men that he is 100% Salinas. Eva and Kandú are caught too close together.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Don Cándido does not seem to be well. Evaristo gives details of the new test, which will involve getting into great shape.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Silvana confesses she's jealous of Adán. Eva blackmails Kandú. Philipe and Adán fight for leadership of the group. Kandú convinces Amadeo to change.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Adán and Philipe remove their masks. Milena learns of Eva's role in her parents' crisis, and demands to talk to Teresa.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: The family disowns Kandú. Teresa reveals she's in love with another man. Gilberto feels guilty and he ignores the reasons for Teresa's evasiveness.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Adán seeks to forge alliances to get Philipe out of the house. Adán and Philipe challenge each other to a duel. Aníbal reveals why Teresa left.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Kandú misses the way the family treats him. Philipe will lead the test. Teresa returns to Felicia's house and reveals her feelings to Gilberto.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Gilberto goes into shock, and Simón's therapy is more powerful than Aníbal's. Adán plays with fire looking for alliances. Fabiana takes the bait.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: The teams test their machines. Eva spends time with Gilberto, offering love and friendship. Amadeo falls in love with a mermaid and visits her.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: The game begins. Amadeo gets dangerously close to the mermaid, but Philipe saves his skin. Philipe's solidarity doesn't go unnoticed.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: The identity of Amadeo's real father comes to light, and he refuses to pardon Doris. Kandú wants to capture the mermaid and asks the family for help.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: To Esperanza's chagrin, Fabiana and Adán reveal their feelings. While many of them go after the mermaid, Adán asks to speak to Evaristo.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Pacheco meets his son, and the family organizes a memorial lunch. Amadeo decides to enter show business. Don Evaristo sets the final game in motion.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: The final project will be created in groups. Fabiana, Aníbal and Kandú each suggest a company. Evaristo announces the chosen project.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Eva achieves her goal, and El Mago assigns roles for the creation of the circus. Caridad announces the ranking. The participants try to pass the test.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: El Mago receives the material for the circus. Philipe invites Esperanza to bed. Adán allows Kandú and Eva to formalize their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Each member of the family thinks of a circus act. Aníbal puts Manuel in a trance and unleashes Milena's fury. Alberto and Libia try a dance number.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Manuel manages to get out of the trance thanks to Martín. Hortensia's health condition worsens. Caridad prevents Amadeo from dividing the family.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza and Philipe are seen kissing, but Eva and El Mago are caught red-handed. Hortensia comes clean. Esperanza is the subject of discussion.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: The circus receives a truckload of stuff. With a push from Aníbal, Hortensia admits her cowardice. Caridad encourages the celebration.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Caridad, Felicia and Silvia plan the judging. The family appears before the jury. Adán and Eva are upset when the police arrive unexpectedly.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: The family regrets the first show. Fabiana is suspicious of Adán and decides to investigate. Don Evaristo makes sure that people go to the circus.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Fabiana learns about Adán's background and confronts him. The buyer of the circus tickets is revealed. Amadeo informs the family of his decision.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: The police take the whole family prisoner. Eva tries to excuse Adán. Don Evaristo ends the test, and half of the inhabitants must leave the house.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Caridad announces the results and who's been evicted. Doris returns to replace one of Evaristo's evictees. Hortensia proposes a big farewell.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Adán makes a difficult decision out of love for Fabiana. Evaristo orders the eliminated players to go to the organization to reveal their identity.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Caridad proposes a new offer from the organization to the players. Evaristo introduces himself to Adán and offers help.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Don Evaristo tests the players' capacity for risk and interviews the last four participants. Philipe and Aníbal go out to fulfill their dreams.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Two finalists are left, and the game is about to end. The former participants choose the winner. Have they finally learned something?
episodes.title: Episode 162
